statements: SELECT * FROM AgricultureData WHERE region = 'Midwest';
SELECT crop_name, production_quantity FROM AgricultureData ORDER BY production_quantity DESC;
SELECT AVG(market_price) AS avg_price FROM AgricultureData WHERE region = 'West';
SELECT crop_name, market_price FROM AgricultureData WHERE market_price > 50 ORDER BY market_price ASC;
SELECT COUNT(id) AS total_records FROM AgricultureData;
SELECT * FROM AgricultureData WHERE production_quantity > 1000 ORDER BY market_price DESC;
SELECT crop_name, SUM(production_quantity) AS total_production FROM AgricultureData GROUP BY crop_name;
SELECT AVG(market_price) AS avg_price, region FROM AgricultureData GROUP BY region ORDER BY avg_price DESC;
SELECT region, COUNT(*) AS crop_count FROM AgricultureData GROUP BY region HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT crop_name, production_quantity, market_price FROM AgricultureData WHERE region='Midwest' ORDER BY production_quantity DESC, market_price ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM AgriculturalOutputs
SELECT crop_name, production_quantity FROM AgriculturalOutputs WHERE id = 1
SELECT production_date, crop_name FROM AgriculturalOutputs ORDER BY production_date DESC
SELECT * FROM MarketPrices WHERE market_location = 'New York'
SELECT crop_name, price_per_quantity FROM MarketPrices ORDER BY price_per_quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM AgriculturalOutputs WHERE crop_name = 'Corn' ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT crop_name, production_quantity FROM AgriculturalOutputs WHERE production_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY production_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM MarketPrices WHERE price_per_quantity > 5 ORDER BY market_location ASC;
SELECT crop_name, SUM(production_quantity) AS total_production FROM AgriculturalOutputs GROUP BY crop_name;
SELECT crop_name, AVG(price_per_quantity) AS avg_price FROM MarketPrices GROUP BY crop_name HAVING AVG(price_per_quantity) > 3;
SELECT * FROM crops;
SELECT crop_name, crop_type FROM crops WHERE crop_type='Fruit';
SELECT crop_name, yield_amount FROM crops JOIN yields ON crops.crop_id = yields.crop_id WHERE year=2021;
SELECT yield_amount, region FROM yields WHERE crop_id=1 ORDER BY yield_amount DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT region FROM yields WHERE year=2022;
SELECT * FROM crops WHERE crop_type = 'Fruit';
SELECT crop_name, crop_growth_period, crop_type FROM crops WHERE crop_growth_period = 'Summer' ORDER BY crop_name ASC;
SELECT crop_name, yield_amount, region FROM crops JOIN yields ON crops.crop_id = yields.crop_id WHERE region = 'California';
SELECT crop_name, yield_amount, year, region FROM crops JOIN yields ON crops.crop_id = yields.crop_id JOIN prices ON crops.crop_id = prices.crop_id WHERE year = 2022 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT crop_name, crop_growth_period, price FROM crops JOIN prices ON crops.crop_id = prices.crop_id ORDER BY price ASC, crop_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM agriculture_outputs;
SELECT crop_name, production_quantity FROM agriculture_outputs WHERE production_quantity > 1000;
SELECT crop_name, production_quantity, production_date FROM agriculture_outputs WHERE production_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM market_prices ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT region_name, country FROM regions WHERE country='USA';
SELECT * FROM agriculture_outputs WHERE crop_name = 'Rice' ORDER BY production_date DESC, production_quantity ASC;
SELECT crop_name, production_quantity FROM agriculture_outputs WHERE production_quantity > 1000 AND production_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT r.region_name, f.security_level, p.price FROM regions r JOIN food_security f ON r.region_id = f.region_id JOIN market_prices p ON r.region_name = p.crop_name WHERE p.price > 5.00;
SELECT AVG(price) AS avg_price, MIN(price) AS min_price, MAX(price) AS max_price FROM market_prices WHERE price_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';

SELECT r.country, COUNT(*) AS num_regions, AVG(f.security_level) AS avg_security_level FROM regions r JOIN food_security f ON r.region_id = f.region_id GROUP BY r.country ORDER BY avg_security_level DESC, num_regions DESC;
SELECT * FROM farmers;
SELECT farmer_name, location FROM farmers WHERE crop_grown = 'Rice';
SELECT farmer_name, crop_grown, location FROM farmers ORDER BY farmer_name DESC;
SELECT crop_name, yield_per_acre, average_price FROM crops WHERE yield_per_acre > 500;
SELECT market_name, location, market_type FROM markets WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT farmer_name, location, crop_grown FROM farmers WHERE farmer_id = 1
SELECT * FROM crops ORDER BY average_price DESC
SELECT market_name, location FROM markets WHERE market_type = 'Wholesale'
SELECT crop_name, yield_per_acre FROM crops WHERE yield_per_acre > 5000
SELECT sale_date, quantity_sold, selling_price FROM sales WHERE quantity_sold > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date ASC
